ComicInfo.Title: All Part of the Design
ComicInfo.Summary:
The main story "All Part of the Design" takes place between Project Superpowers #5 and #6 at Dynamic Boy's funeral with Dynamic Man reflecting on his past and their collective adventures in Germany during WWII.
This Wizard issue also features short previews of the following mini-series spinning off Dynamite Entertainment's Project Superpowers:
Black Terror #1Death Defying Devil #1Masquerade #1
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 16:11:49. [CVDB149088]
ComicInfo.Characters: Adolf Hitler, Black Terror, Boy King, Daredevil, Dynamic Boy, Dynamic Man, Dynamic Woman, Fighting Yank, Giant, Green Lama, Hydroman, Kitten, Miss Masque, Mr. Face, Pyroman, Samson, The Flame, The Owl, The Target, V-Man
